comments.author: AHOYBRAUSE
comments.body: Hello.Good luck with your service.To be honest, sorry to say it but I think this only attracts people that are scammers. People that have reputation here can always go to the established users in the forum that offer loans, also that's for a much smaller %.20$ is not really an amount that would help anybody, unless you need some crypto for some gas fees or whatever.But for a scammer, they even think 20$ is worth scamming, sad world.Anyway, I hope you can make some good business, just be careful.Cheers

comments.author: CYBER_COWBOY
comments.body: Quote from: AHOYBRAUSE on March 21, 2023, 09:56:25 AMHello.Good luck with your service.To be honest, sorry to say it but I think this only attracts people that are scammers. People that have reputation here can always go to the established users in the forum that offer loans, also that's for a much smaller %.20$ is not really an amount that would help anybody, unless you need some crypto for some gas fees or whatever.But for a scammer, they even think 20$ is worth scamming, sad world.Anyway, I hope you can make some good business, just be careful.CheersThanks for your feedback and opinion.¬† I understand 20$ is a bit low, but as I said can I lend bigger amounts when I have some trust in the customer with better %.But to start with I think 20$ is a reasonable amount. I dont afford to risk more¬† Yes I reach out to the honest people who maybe need some bucks for gas or whatever some days before salary.We all need to start somewhere. Wish you the best Best regards CC.
